mapper.select: SELECT GORVCODE, GORVMID, GORVGCODE, GORVTITLE, GORVCONTENTS, TO_CHAR(GODATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')AS GODATE, GORVLIKE FROM GOODSREVIEW ORDER BY GORVCODE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOODSREVIEW(GORVCODE, GORVMID, GORVGCODE, GORVTITLE, GORVCONTENTS, GODATE, GORVLIKE) VALUES(#{gorvcode}, #{gorvmid}, #{gorvgcode}, #{gorvtitle}, #{gorvcontents}, SYSDATE, #{gorvlike})
